references: Related: CF 196398, CF 196248, CF 196301. Amending: Ord 45382
summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 4 to 8 inclusive, Block 3, Ayer and O'Hara's Addition; the west 38 feet of Lot 4, Block 1, Porterfield's Addition; and Lots 11 and 12, Block 3, Brooklyn Addition; with respect to Use, Height and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto three new sections numbered 2-219, 10-11 and 17-163, respectively.
